story.title: The Catalog
story.synopsis: Discussions with a pet pony trafficker.

story.title: My Dear Brielle
story.synopsis: A letter from mother to daughter, a former human male writing to her filly.

story.title: What Money Can Buy
story.synopsis: A wealthy, friendless man is given the chance to start life anew.

story.title: Pink Hair
story.synopsis: A prankster has his world turned upside-down by the victim of his latest prank.

story.title: Mama Blackbox
story.synopsis: Eggy Farts anon be trollin’. Anons are turned into ponies and taken away to new homes.

story.title: Assorted Anonpone Stories
story.synopsis: Partial archive of Anonpone thread. One anonymous human is turned into a pony for the carnal enjoyment of another.

story.title: Anon and Luna
story.synopsis: Luna takes Anon in as her faithful student, and decides to take their relationship further. Shenanigans ensue.

story.title: Amy
story.synopsis: A girl browses the internet, steadily getting more horny as she turns into a stallion.

story.title: Matt
story.synopsis: A man comes home to find that his girlfriend has been turned into a horny stallion.

story.title: Milky
story.synopsis: Anon tries hypnosis with messy results.

story.title: Milky Way TF
story.synopsis: A dude is whisked away in his sleep for some selfcest.

story.title: Mrs Cake TF
story.synopsis: Anon dedicates himself to baking.

story.title: Dadcord
story.synopsis: Anon is taken from her peaceful apartment by the trickiest of chaos spirits.

story.title: Trixies
story.synopsis: Trixie uses a lovestruck Anon to indulge her narcissism.

story.title: Cuddly Doom
story.synopsis: Anon is surprised by a small mare in his bedroom, thankfully she just wants to make friends and cuddle

story.title: Make Milk Mares Great Again!
story.synopsis: Trump has a plan to make America great again, it involves turning anon into a milk mare and using her as a machine gun

story.title: Call of Duty, Cuddle warfare
story.synopsis: An undercover CIA Op goes horribly wrong when the agent comes in contact with an adorable bio weapon

story.title: My level was drained by a succupony in the other world
Sterling Sprocket Finding His Cutie Mark in Neighagra Port
The Fertility God
story.synopsis: Twilight finds a test subject with quite the over productive body.

story.title: Anonmare
story.synopsis: It turns out being a mare in Equestria is a lot more complicated than Anon thought. Estrus certainly isn’t making things easy.

story.title: Capitulation
story.synopsis: Unemployed guy signs his life away to be a sissy little colt.

story.title: Cutting Corners
story.synopsis: Two friends find a lazy genie, but both still get what they want

story.title: Denature
story.synopsis: A mysterious stallion abducts someone to be a made-to-order bride.

story.title: Juniper
story.synopsis: Anon living in Equestria goes native.

story.title: TulpAnon
story.synopsis: A large-scale explosion set off by Twilight's magic seems to have vaporized Anon's body, and thrown his consciousness into Pinkie Pie! Until Twilight can construct a new body for Anon, he has to live through Pinkie Pie, and the two have to learn to share a body.

story.title: Pon-E: Purple Black Gray
story.synopsis: Two anons go down the slippery slope that is Pon-E usage.

story.title: Pon-E: Doctor's Oath
story.synopsis: A veterinarian gets roped into life with a herd of Pon-E users.

story.title: Discordia! Or: How I came to Love the Mare
The Pon-E Rewrites: Purple Black Gray
Be the Change You Want to See in the World
Iwtcird
story.synopsis: Anon should really choose better wording when asking Discord for wishes.

story.title: A hasty jump at the call
Floorbored - Moonlight is a NEET’s comfort food
Littlepip TF
story.synopsis: World War III is finally upon us, and our main character emerges from it all as a small Fallout-inspired equine.

story.title: The Adventures of the Chaos Colt
story.synopsis: Long before the mane six, Discord finds a small colt with a knack for the chaotic and decides to take him under his wing. The thing is, he never planned to get sealed in stone, and now his adopted son is flying solo.

story.title: Lotus Love
story.synopsis: Anon of Erf’s Dadonequus Discord gets a massage from the Ponyville Spa with some extra special service.

story.title: Elo’s Nightmare
story.synopsis: Anon of Elo’s Unforeseen Consequences and his marefriend Cherrywood have some alone time after a mishap with a mechanical hand.

story.title: The Trial
story.synopsis: Anon is goaded into clicking a strange link, with unforeseen consequences.

story.title: Anun teh Spyro
story.synopsis: Anon makes a deal with Princess Celestia, one that leaves him as a magnificent, fire-breathing short-stack and her personal assistant.

story.title: Welcome to Los Pegasus
story.synopsis: Anon was having a bad day, all up until he accidentally detached himself from causality and spacetime; now it’s a very bad day.

story.title: Stuck with you for a bit.
Anon and his Friendo the Brony
Bubble Vision
story.synopsis: A second-person fic involving you getting turned into Derpy Hooves.

story.title: One Lucky Pet
story.synopsis: Anon has become a mute pony. No-one is aware he used to be a person and treats him like a pretty pet.

story.title: Anonfilly and Twilight Hearth's Warming Green
New Beginnings: Anny Fic
story.synopsis: It's been six years since Anon woke up in Cloudsdale as a foal, taken in by a pegasus couple. Anon, now going by the given name Bluebelle, deals with some of the issues facing regular children on top of having to struggle to maintain her own sense of self.

story.title: A Transformative Trial
story.synopsis: You are Anonymous and have wound up in Equestria. Now you must find your way back to earth without being turned into a pony. The catch? Everypony wants to turn you into one by doing it with you and the Magic of Friendship is causing them to get a little crazy.

story.title: Old Pony TF Story
story.synopsis: Anon becomes a pony and loses his Virginity To The Family Dog

story.title: Adventures of Anontonio
story.synopsis: An italian anon gets taken to the wonderful world of Equestria by none other than the spirit of chaos, given the form of a colt.

story.title: Legacy of Anontonio
story.synopsis: Anontonio sits at the top of his business empire, having made a name for himself in Equestria, but family troubles complicate his life.

story.title: TentaclesAnon
story.synopsis: Anon makes a devious deal with a chaotic spirit, leaving his old life to start a new one in the body of a young, tentacled green colt.

story.title: How I learned to stop worrying and love being the sluttymare
Rarity captures and rapes a human
Off brand bleach and a candy overdose
Hunted: The Life and Times of Rowan Wilton, Griffon
Twilight Turns Anon into a Filly
Nesting
story.synopsis: You and Gilda have been dating for a while now, and recently moved into a place together. Randomly, you turn into a pony and she turns into a griffon. Sex happens.

story.title: Don't Let the Bedbats Bite
story.synopsis: Fluttershy has been gracious enough to allow you to stay in a spare room in her cottage for nearly a year now. But the peace and harmony of living in the animal lover's home is shattered when a mysterious bite mark appears on one of your arms.

story.title: King Sombra's Ponut Platoon
story.synopsis: King Sombra's young rule is already facing a deep crisis. None of his ungrateful subjects wish to work for him to guard the palace! But the mad king has an unconventional solution. Kidnap men from other worlds and transform them into subservient ponies. And hey, if they turn out to be horny and well-hung, that's just a lucky bonus.

story.title: Fights for Rights to Stripes and Delights
Turning Into A Pony And All The Benefits Involved
Go Ask Littlepip When She's Two And A Half Feet Tall
story.synopsis: Caelum forgot to read the label on some pills that his friend gifted him, and the pills leave him feeling more than a little horse, and even worse this is exactly what his friend was expecting.

story.title: A Ticket To The Circus
story.synopsis: A man finds himself in a forest with nothing but a strange circus ticket to his name. Nightmare Pinkie Pie is in town, and she's planning to put on a show that will change his life forever.

story.title: Turning Myself Into a Half-Ton Cybernetic Princess Luna In An Abandoned Woolworths To Prank My Friend at 3AM Challenge (Gone Wrong) (Gone Sexual)
story.synopsis: A man turns to a back-alley arcanotech surgeon and mechanic. He undergoes hours of grueling and agonizing surgery to turn himself into a copy of Princess Luna.

story.title: Time and Space with Other Traits
Cloud Charmer, or How I Drank Heavily and Became the Pony
How to Make a Chaos Noodle
Unforeseen Consequences
story.synopsis: A scientist ends up in Equestria as a colt and is adopted by two very powerful figures.

story.title: Living Under the Moon
story.synopsis: The tale of an anon who spaghettis his way through a wild adventure.

story.title: Pon-E
story.synopsis: The story that started all the hubbub about spaghetti-flavored pills.

story.title: Pon-E Blackouts
story.synopsis: An exploration into the downsides of Pon-E usage.

story.title: Pon-e: Interview with a Pon-E Peddler
story.synopsis: A pony TF story from the perspective of someone not turning into a cuddly horse.

story.title: The Mysterious Case of Mare Do Well
story.synopsis: Anon becomes a superhero horse as the result of a bet.

story.title: Oi, You got a brushie for that coat?
You will never be a real human
Dadonequus Discord
story.synopsis: A manchild goes with Discord to Equestria in the body of a colt as his adoptive son.

story.title: Dadonequus Discord: The After Years
story.synopsis: After a childhood full of adventure, Anon settles down with his wife, Diamond Tiara. This is the story of their family, notably the adventures of their three children, Anon Jr., Illustrious Rich, and Crown Jewel.

story.title: Decay
story.synopsis: In the midst of a rising epidemic, our protagonist finds themselves slowly rotting from the inside-out. Their friend, however, seems to take it all in stride.

story.title: CMC Get Anon Transformed
story.synopsis: The CMC question Anon about his lack of a Cutie Mark, they take him to Twilight because humans can't get Cutie Marks.

story.title: Camping Trouble
story.synopsis: An otherworldly beast captures a guy out camping and turns him into a pony via tentacle rape.

story.title: Captive
story.synopsis: An unnamed man is held captive by a purple horse speaking in an unknown language, a spell she casts backfires turning the man into a pony, like her.

story.title: Eris-istible
story.synopsis: A guy is chosen at random by Discord to be his partner in chaos on Earth.

story.title: The Enchantress
story.synopsis: A unicorn with a TF fetish captures a number of creatures and keeps them for sexual pleasure. She learns of a strange creature called a "human" that has recently arrived in Equestria and wishes to add him to her collection

story.title: Pone-ocalypse
story.synopsis: Ponies appear and begin transforming anyone they touch into even more ponies. The unnamed protagonist tries to flee to safety as the ponies quickly outnumber humans.

story.title: Day At The Spa
story.synopsis: Twilight Sparkle decides that her human friend could use a deep massage at the spa.

story.title: Pon-E Bust
story.synopsis: A Pon-E user struggles with personal demons while skirting the law.

story.title: Whore of Equestria
story.synopsis: Maggie finds herself in a terrible place, but it’s not all bad. Is that a pony?

story.title: Anon in Twilight’s body x Pinkie
In a kennel cause you deserve it
Formerly a Melancholic Wretch, Now I've become a Pony Addict?
story.synopsis: A broken student finds solace within a drug which doesn't belong in this world. How much of himself will be lost as he delves deeper into a pony fueled delirium?

story.title: A Mirror, Brightly
story.synopsis: Paul's eccentric uncle sends him a "magic" mirror which he promises will change his life for the better. When the mirror turns out to actually be magical Paul must face a whole new set of problems.

story.title: Cuddly Doom
story.synopsis: Daisy had a fun time making friends with Storm Cloud, now it’s time to make friends with the rest of the neighbors

story.title: The annual Pon-E festival is (not) a hive of degeneracy
Anon's Last Day as a Human
Dadonequus
story.synopsis: A performer down on his luck is given an offer he can’t refuse by a certain spirit of chaos, so long as he plays along.

story.title: The Obfuscation of Self
story.synopsis: This isn’t the first time that Anon has become a pony in his adventures in Equestria… it’s just that this time, no one can remember him -- or rather, her -- being anypony different.

story.title: Heiress of Chaos
story.synopsis: Anon has a penchant for destruction. Having caught the eye of Discord, he is turned into Eris, at the price of freeing Discord from the statue he was imprisoned in. What’s the worst that could happen?

story.title: Deep in the Caves
story.synopsis: A young man is in for a traumatic experience when he finds himself in a changeling hive and covered in caustic goo.

story.title: Lexicon
story.synopsis: Anon enters a strange cave and becomes the unicorn Scribbled Lexicon. Nobody remembers Anon but everybody knows about Lexi. Now Anon has to figure out who he can convince to help him without coming off as insane.

story.title: Welcome to the Tabernacle: Henry and the Middle Man
story.synopsis: A strange underground casino with a strange set of rules leads people to fall into massive debt while playing there. Those who wish to absolve their debts can play at high stakes tables where losing leads to unique forms of payment.

story.title: Fleur
story.synopsis: An anon with no job or social skills finds himself in Equestria as a dragon. To make matters worse they are initially confused for a dragon ambassador, but it’s not like being forced to work with the actual ambassador was much better.

story.title: Dadonequus Discord
story.synopsis: Anon is a colt out of his element, rotting in an orphanage in Equestria, but that all changes thanks to the spirit of Chaos.

story.title: Hope
story.synopsis: An antisocial anon ends up in Equestria as a dragon, only for Twilight and her friends to show up, apparently sent by the cutie map.

story.title: A Drug and Pony Show
story.synopsis: A genre-savvy anon narrowly avoids getting turned into a pony, only to get involved in the business of turning anons into ponies for fun and profit.

story.title: Spike’s Tale
story.synopsis: A university student meets a peculiar girl who seems to know him. He then starts growing purple and green scales.

story.title: Birds of a Feather
story.synopsis: Anon hates birds. This becomes complicated once he turns into a cat bird.

story.title: Anon Investigates
story.synopsis: Anon turns into a filly and falls for Spike after saving him from an exotic animals trafficker.

story.title: Winter Flowers
story.synopsis: A group of friends find a strange stone idol which turns them into ponies and pits them against an eldritch menace.

story.title: What’s in a Name?
story.synopsis: A guy has an Equestrian naming dream about the name of his future foal.

story.title: Anon the Dragon
story.synopsis: A young man is surprised to find himself as an icy beast in the frozen north surrounding the Crystal Kingdom.

story.title: SUPER MEGA FIGHTING ROBOT RAINBOW DASH
Anon Turns into a Horrible Mutant Lust Chimera
story.synopsis: Exactly what the title says.

story.title: Please Don't Hurt Me
story.synopsis: An unrepentant and magnificent jerk finally scores a chance with the hottest chick in school. Too bad for him she'll leave him a twisted, confused and considerably more furred mess by the night's end.

story.title: A Gift from the Sun
story.synopsis: A man lost and dying in the desert finds an unlikely savior in the form of Princess Celestia. She can save him, but the cost will be great, and it's guaranteed he will never be the same.

story.title: The Lion and the Lamb
story.synopsis: You finally decide to come out of your shell and of all the people you run into, it was her.

story.title: Anon Gets Chased 'Cus Ponies have an Inanimate TF Fetish
story.synopsis: Exactly what the title says.

story.title: Intensive Study
story.synopsis: A young woman and a certain teacher get a face full of a Poison Joke. The tricks it plays have a little more sting than usual, toying cruelly with minds and body shapes.

story.title: Aren’t We Lovely
story.synopsis: A human visiting Rarity has an odd reaction about her.

story.title: My Name is Eri-
story.synopsis: A young man searching for meaning in life only finds his turned upside-down when he meets a mysterious woman on the bus.

story.title: Call it Greed
story.synopsis: A woman steals a string of diamonds in a moment of impulse. Fear drives her to bury it, greed makes her dig deep, and dogged obsession won't let anything stop her.

story.title: The Horse House of Horror
story.synopsis: "We're going to play a game, so pay very close attention. I put a tiny little spell on one object in your house. The spell is simple: If you touch the object, you turn into a pony."

story.title: Zecora's Haunted Baja Blast
story.synopsis: A mysterious hut in the middle of the woods. A bottle of soda that's more than it seems. An idiot who's far too determined for his own good.

story.title: Anon's Quest for the Phat Ass
Daddy-o Discord
story.synopsis: Anon makes a deal with Discord. He gets to live in a land of technicolor ponies but he has to play along with Discord’s chaotic plans.

story.title: Armor TF Green (Get Armored Dummy V2)
The Gold Standard
story.synopsis: A newly minted golden dragon must find her place in her new world and grapple with old wounds.

story.title: The Universal Solvent
story.synopsis: A scientist gets in over her head when she travels to a land populated by former humans.

tags.tag: Crossover (The Gold Standard, Dazed, Tonic the Dragon)

story.title: Faster than the Eye
story.synopsis: A sleight of hand artist finds out that he's an even better magician in a world of spells and dragons.

story.title: Untitled Eris Green
story.synopsis: A young man’s life of shitposting and causing trouble is cut short in favor of causing a bit more potent forms of chaos.

story.title: Spiced
story.synopsis: Jazz decides he needs some more exotic ingredients for his cooking hobby, and Tonic seems a decent enough accomplice to their procurement.

tags.tag: Crossover (The Gold Standard, Faster than the Eye)

story.title: Make Hay whilst the Sun Shines
On the Observation of Patient Zero
Anon meets a pony clone of himself
A Compilation of Mama Mare Stories
High Flyer
story.synopsis: Overnight everything changed. So many humans lost their forms for strange new equine ones, and now the world has to figure out how to move forward. This is Stephanie’s story.

author.name: Mr. "IS IT GOOD ITS MY FIRST TIME"

story.title: Summer Break, with Much at Stake
Be Careful What You Wish For
Better Than Best Friends
story.synopsis: One night, you take your pal Soarin on a bar crawl to help him get over his latest rejection from Spitfire, then get an idea. If Spitfire won't give him the time of day, you will. As a mare.

story.title: It Reminds Me
story.synopsis: A human wakes up as a newborn changeling queen and learns first hoof the cruelty of life in the hive.

story.title: I wish I were Anonstallion and had a cute autistic family
Anon’s a filly and Twi’s not a cunt
How I Learned to Love Being The Mare In Heat
Putting the Luna in Lunatic
story.synopsis: Neil had everything planned carefully, His parents were heading out, his little sister was out at a sleepover. The house was his, and that meant he could finally use the drug that according to /Pon-E/ would transform him into a real pony, for a short twelve-hour span. Nothing could ruin today...right?

story.title: Living in the Limelight
story.synopsis: Three months since /Pon-E/ and its namesake had appeared online. For Freddy it was life-changing, bringing him new friends and creating the closest friendships he's ever known. For Freddy's father, the changes he's seen in his son are a source of worry. Fearing the worst, He'll have to investigate whilst his son is out.

story.title: Under A Violet Moon
story.synopsis: Neil's dreams had changed ever since he transformed into the Princess of the Night, spending his nights in a strange place which he suspects is the dreamscape. When a pink orb appears practically radiating negative emotions he knows he must step in to try and help.

story.title: Misc TFs from various image prompts
PonyMindswapGreentext
story.synopsis: Twilight swaps her mind with Anon, and now he has to find a way to switch back.

tags.tag: Human to Pony to Equestria Girl

story.title: Bad Trip
story.synopsis: Which is worse? Thinking that your face is melting off due to acid or trying to resist giving into pets while a pony?

story.title: Quarantine
story.synopsis: Join anon as he tries to escape from a secret facility. Also he’s a horse.

story.title: Muse’s Memory Mystery
story.synopsis: Poor Muse wakes up in the company of ponies with only the barest sense of who she used to be.

story.title: Unplugged
story.synopsis: You were sitting at your computer one evening when suddenly you had the unpleasant experience of becoming a work-in-progress automaton.

story.title: Dazed
story.synopsis: A punky brit gets transported to Equestria with a hot new body.

story.title: Hangin’
story.synopsis: Poor Spike has to deal with Daze’s bullshit.

story.title: Discord vs. Daze
story.synopsis: Shenanigans of the highest order ensue when Discord taunts Daze.

story.title: Things are Gucci
story.synopsis: Daze takes Khoa on a shopping trip to Manehattan.

story.title: Scylla
story.synopsis: A woman wakes up in a strange new land and in a strange body after even stranger dreams.

story.title: Scylla: The Forbidden Apple
story.synopsis: Big Mac finds Scylla amidst the throes of pleasure.

story.title: Scylla: That Sweet Candy Apple
story.synopsis: A needy Scylla gets a bit of help from a reluctant Big Macintosh.

story.title: Anon Is a Mare in Heat
story.synopsis: After ending up on the wrong end of a prank by Discord, Anon has to find a way to fight his new urges and become human again.

story.title: Broodmare
story.synopsis: An unlucky Anon ends up involuntarily participating in a college student’s science experiment.

story.title: Our Town
story.synopsis: A snarky anon ends up in Starlight Glimmer’s town before her reformation and has to learn how to adapt to his new life to avoid further changes.

story.title: Flu Season
story.synopsis: A group of college students rooming together fall ill with an unusual strain of the flu, and their friend has to take care of them while resisting the illness himself.

story.title: Fond Memories
story.synopsis: The son of a prominent auto executive experiments with species-altering drugs in an /o/tistic coming-of-age story.

story.title: Palomino Activity
story.synopsis: A group of friends explores an old mansion possessed by unseen forces.

story.title: The Plushie Store
story.synopsis: A lonely Anon looks for the perfect pony plushie online.

story.title: Why Would Anyone Like This Griffon So Much?
Lady of the Mountain
story.synopsis: Anon and friends babysit a whole clan of Kobolds that worship the very ground she walks on.

story.title: I don't have a title yet whoops
Anon Will Be a Totally Gay Dragon
How to Deal with Unexpected Events

tags.tag: Shitting and Vomiting at the same time

story.title: Heroes Never Die
story.synopsis: Ari was not among those transformed. With transformation magic banned forever and demonized by most of society, it appears she's stuck as a human permanently.

story.title: The Adventures of Bob and Gerald
The Luna Experience
story.synopsis: You stumble into what appears to be a room themed almost entirely around Princess Luna. Though no one seems around to see you, nor read your badmouthing of Luna online, you'll find out what it really means to walk in her hooves soon enough.

story.title: Rarity’s Makeover
story.synopsis: An unlucky man is stuck in Equestria. He needs some new clothes, and what better place to go than Rarity's boutique? She wants a favor in return, though...

story.title: A Buggy Holiday
story.synopsis: A man has a strange reaction to a bug bite.

story.title: A Strange New Year
story.synopsis: A buggy invasion makes the whole world burn.

story.title: Plushi
story.synopsis: Two best friends receive plushies of their OC’s, also hooves.

story.title: Bugged up
story.synopsis: An anon-turned Changeling ends up in Equestria only to find it a bit different than expected.

story.title: 2-[(1R,6R)-6-isopropenyl-3-methylcyklohex-2-en-1-yl]-5-pentylbenzen-1,3-diol
story.synopsis: A group of friends get high and end up in Equestria as quite the menagerie.

story.title: Breaking Horse
story.synopsis: A pharmacist stumbles upon a strange concoction with the ability to turn people into tiny pastel horses. Also, drugs, the mob, and cuddles.

story.title: Detective Hoarse
story.synopsis: >Be detective, get shot, die, solve crime in Equestria

story.title: Coming of Age
story.synopsis: A normal guy finds he's not of normal descent- suggesting you read my entire portfolio to understand.

tags.tag: Sequel (A Buggy Holiday, A Strange New Year, Breaking Horse)

story.title: Let Her In
story.synopsis: Celestia has invaded our world, and infectious cartoon ponies are quickly overwhelming humanity. But why is the Princess of the Sun so interested in you? And could this entire invasion be your fault?

story.title: Trick Mirror
story.synopsis: Trixie pulls you into Equestria and plays around with your body, turning you into various kinds of ponies.

story.title: Nightmare Tryst
story.synopsis: Nightmare Moon pops up in poor Riley's dreams, and begins slowly, sexually transforming him into Luna.

story.title: Beach Bum Anon
story.synopsis: A crazed homeless man is transported to Equestria in the body of a colt.

story.title: Celestia and Luna pick on humans for fun
Thing (I have no idea what I’m doing)
Anonfilly sells her body for the Filly Scouts
Lyra and Bonbon go for a jog
Greek Ponies
story.synopsis: Sunny has a lot on her plate with classes and sorority life. Then everything gets flipped sideways by her weird lab partner.

story.title: My Little Stallion
story.synopsis: You met the most wonderful woman last night and had a helluva time back at her place. Turns out, though, she’s not from Earth.

story.title: The Scratch
story.synopsis: A classical musician needs money, and finds a mysterious dubstep tutorial to help with composing, and gets more than he bargained for with one hell of a transformation.

story.title: The Contract
story.synopsis: It's a once in a lifetime chance. An opportunity to go to Equestria. But what does Twilight require in return?

story.title: Tonic the Dragon
story.synopsis: A newly transformed dragoness explores a whole new world of possibilities with their second chance at life.

story.title: Equestria Five-O
story.synopsis: A buddy cop fic starring Punki’s Daze and Kolaghan’s Khoa.

story.title: Tonic rebooted: now with thiccer thighs
Convention Story
story.synopsis: You woulda thought human sacrifice had gone out of fashion by this day and age, but you’d be wrong.

story.title: Somewhere Over the Moon
story.synopsis: A young man named Eric is experiencing the joys of a life on the decline. It doesn't help that he's plagued by strange individuals and morbid thoughts. Also, an alarming number of people seem to think he's Princess Luna.

story.title: Five Score, Divided by Four
story.synopsis: Two friends unexpectedly start to turn into Rainbow Dash and Applejack. Follow them on their journey as they react to their changes and find out so much more about themselves than they ever bargained for.

story.title: Royal Duties
story.synopsis: Princess Cadance pulls an unwitting man into her form so that she can enjoy a vacation from her life.

story.title: A Penny For Your Thoughts
story.synopsis: A young man takes a potion to make him his crush’s ideal mate and is surprised by the results.

story.title: Lyra’s Splash Zone
story.synopsis: Lyra Heartstrings has a few quirks, ones that come out to play during an encounter with her human date.

story.title: Leroy’s Story
story.synopsis: Anon is overcome with big changes, physically and mentally, after finding a strange program on the internet.

story.title: Loving Grace
story.synopsis: In a dystopian future, humans are kept in a breeding program and repurposed for life as pastel mares.

story.title: A Pony for Christmas
story.synopsis: This short story is so short if we said anything here it would spoil the whole thing.

story.title: WikiHow to Help a Recently Transformed Pony
story.synopsis: Helpful instructions for calming the victims of transformation.

story.title: Greg read WikiHow
story.synopsis: A young man’s life is turned upside down, but luckily Greg is there and knows what to do.

story.title: A long hard night
story.synopsis: Whose dick do you have to suck to become a pony? This guy’s.

story.title: Behind the Wire
story.synopsis: In a stroke of cruel luck Anon goes from being a typical college student to a lab grade Pegasus. He must now endure the abuse of his handler and repeated experiments, with his only social contact being the pony in the cage next to him.

story.title: Sick Day
story.synopsis: A strange illness overtakes a college campus, turning students and faculty into pastel equines.

story.title: Lavender Sky
story.synopsis: A person is voluntarily repurposed into the little pet mare.

story.title: The Mare in the Mirror
story.synopsis: A pony with aspirations of hopping dimensions swaps places with a young man.

story.title: Prize Pony
story.synopsis: Anon wins a plush pony from a claw machine, but the prize turns out to be so much more.

story.title: When The Horse is Sleeping
story.synopsis: After giving his Stallion friend a not-so-rude awakening Anon gets to experience first hand what it is like to be the sleeping pony

story.title: Coming to Know My Place
story.synopsis: Anon’s Master decides it’s time to make his pet a full-time pony, but has something a bit more kinky than a standard Pon-E overdose planned for him

story.title: Little colt
story.synopsis: A man gets turned into a femmy stallion by a dominant unicorn.

story.title: Inheritor of Chaos
story.synopsis: A young man goes to Equestria to become a prince of chaos and learn the ropes of villainy.

story.title: This is a story all about how i became Vinyl Scratch
Trixing Switch
story.synopsis: When Trixie visits you in a dream and tells you that she wants to change places for half a year, you accept thinking it’s all a silly dream. Little did you know just what you agreed to.

story.title: Heartstrings, Sweetie Drops and You
story.synopsis: When you meet the perfect girl online, you think you found your future girlfriend when she agrees to go on a date with you. Only to find out that said girl is in fact the minty green unicorn Lyra Heartstrings.

story.title: Liar-Ah The Bodystealer
story.synopsis: You are Anon, or are you? When Lyra steals your body, you suddenly find yourself the pray of a certain cream colored mare. Will you be able to fight her off, or will you be forced to play along?

story.title: Carrier
story.synopsis: Anon transcends his human form in the messiest way possible.

story.title: CRUNCHTIME
story.synopsis: A college student in a hurry to finish some work takes what he believes to a painkiller. He ends up as the little mare, and to make things worse, he’s in estrous. Thus begins the Keyboard Masher saga.

story.title: PEER PRESSURE
story.synopsis: Keyboard Masher continues her college-bound adventures in a second installment.

story.title: TEMPTING TENSION
story.synopsis: Keyboard Masher continues her college-bound adventures in a third installment.

story.title: Hunt
story.synopsis: Keyboard Masher’s father goes out for a bit of hunting.

story.title: Apocrita: The Worst Lovebug
story.synopsis: When a Counter-Strike pro’s tainted medication leaves him as a changeling, he must learn how to headshot with hooves before the upcoming tournament.

story.title: Swapped
story.synopsis: Anon and Princess Celestia inadvertently swap bodies.

story.title: Reflection
story.synopsis: A young man wakes up in Canterlot castle in a much different shape.

story.title: Deferment
story.synopsis: A human recounts the events following the meeting of human and Equestrian societies.

tags.tag: Shares Themes With TCB Fics But Isn’t One (Really)

story.title: That Particular Instance I Performed Metempsychosis As An Equine Named After A Piece Of Silverware
story.synopsis: Silver Spoon. Derived from the phrase "born with a silver spoon in your mouth," which implies being born into wealth, privilege, and now being a pony too apparently.

story.title: Agent Nomino
story.synopsis: Pepe Anónimo finds himself employed as a secret agent, but one thing is amiss. He is now a little colt, living with Lyra Heartstrings and Bon Bon.

tags.tag: Makes you want to be the Pet

story.title: Radiance
story.synopsis: Anon is at the end of his rope. Just as he tries to an hero, a mysterious party intervenes. Anon soon finds himself in the confusing life of an amnesiac pony with a doting sister.
